>
[Specialized Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4905) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Wylderheart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=318) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4888)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized. Your animal companion gains one specialization of your choice (page 211.

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your companion.
name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
